name: Limo Expert Taxi Rider
description: Be the limousine driver that drives for tourist through the big city. In these limousine car it’s not only fun and enjoyment. This job requires some professional limo driving skills. Driver with smooth controls to enjoy adventurous and collect rings and reach on parking place. This Limo is best parking game,never seen before. The city has really great parking games missions waiting for you be ready to complete them.  Your luxury taxi driving skills to become her personal taxi driver. This simulator will take you on a tour of the whole city in your luxury vehicle. You are offered a chance to drive this amazing limo as taxi and this is better. Driving this long vehicle in a city highway environment brings a thrill where dangerous sharp turns will wait for you for see your driving skill. Are you challenge accepted? Then come and join this simulator game and show his expertise.
